scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts three figures in the foreground against a red, textured background with gold and silver accents. On the left, two older men with long white beards and elaborate hats stand beside a young child dressed in a yellow tunic. The child is reaching out to the man on the right, who is seated and also has a long white beard and a red and gold hat. This seated figure is gesturing towards the child. The figures are dressed in richly colored robes, with the man on the right wearing a prominent blue robe adorned with gold trim. The ground is depicted as green, suggesting an outdoor setting. The overall composition suggests a moment of interaction or presentation, possibly within a narrative context.
scene_interpretation: Presentation of Jesus in the Temple
